WorkItem.Description: In the tutorial document when you got to CartSummary partial view I was a little surprised when I saw ViewData being used because it wasn't explained. As I understand it now, that's just an older (non-dynamic) ViewBag, but I'd like to see an explaination of how it's different, or just stick to ViewBag.
WorkItem.Summary: Explain What ViewData and how it Differs From ViewBag

Comments.Message: I'll convert to ViewBag in next release
